headline: Iron Mountain Expands Planned Data Center Capacity in Virginia by more than 350 Megawatts
summary: PORTSMOUTH, N.H., November 18, 2024--Iron Mountain (NYSE: IRM), a global leader in information management services, has acquired two data center development sites in Virginia - adding significant planned capacity to support its rapid growth in the data center market.
